title: Michael Browers
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003635/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003635/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Michael Browers**

Based in Duluth, [Minnesota](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003635/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Minnesota), Michael Browers specializes in [dingbat](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003635/http:/typophile.com/wiki/dingbat) and [display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003635/http:/typophile.com/wiki/display) typefaces that are sold worldwide to countries such as Australia, Canada, Germany, India, Indonesia, Netherlands, Poland, Switzerland, United Kingdom, and the United States.

Additionally, Michael offers print, web, and logo design.

E-mail: [info@michaelbrowers.com](mailto:info@michaelbrowers.com)  
Web: [http://www.michaelbrowers.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003635/http:/www.michaelbrowers.com/ "http://www.michaelbrowers.com")
author: Ratbaggy
